item.title: Wall Street Wrestles With Hedging Conundrum as Valuations Swell
item.description: Nathan Thooft is no market bear. His team at Manulife Investment Management, which oversees $160 billion, still holds a modest overweight in stocks. But as US markets jump from record to record, he’s

item.title: Market Uncertainty Over Tariffs Is Easing, Manulife IM's Franklin Says
item.description: Marc Franklin of Manulife Investment Management says that even though US tariff levels are increasing, “policy uncertainty has actually come down and that’s generally constructive for risk appetite.”

item.title: Market Uncertainty Over Tariffs Is Easing, Manulife IM's Franklin Says
item.description: Marc Franklin of Manulife Investment Management says that even though US tariff levels are increasing, “policy uncertainty has actually come down and that’s generally constructive for risk appetite.”
